title: Turning around a lost game into a win!
body:
We were losing all early and it just took 1 team fight to turn around! 

{{champion:119}}

https://vid.me/xIlg

https://vid.me/CvNo

replies.body:
I remember during one of my placement games I went splitpush support zilean when I saw everyone else on my team was really far behind and we were losing teamfights because our tank didn't exactly have any tank items.

I literally just spent my entire time keeping 2-3 people top because the enemy team was dumb enough to send the wrong team members to stop me and they didn't have any especially mobile assassins and I had a talisman (gtg fast), sightstone (vision), morellonomicon (cdr and spam), ludens (waveclear and ms), zzrot (ms, placed this bot whilst pushing top with my  team defending mid inhibitor turret) and sorc boots (this and two ap items are all you need to 1shot minion waves), so catching me just wasn't going to happen (except that time they did but I kinda dicked around so it was my fault and it still took a really long time to kill me and I went from enemy top inhibitor, round the nexus, through botlane towers and all the way to dragon pit before I got cut off). I think we actually ended up winning that game because the enemy wasted all their time trying to deal with the cancer that is a splitpushing lvl7 zilean. I would also do dicky things like splitpush and then use my outrageous movespeed to join teamfights for an easy 5v3 before the enemy could get back to the fiesta that is all mid.
